title: Add abort wire protocol type and pi-socket abort handler
summary: Implemented abort wire protocol: Added AbortRequest type to hyper-pi-protocol, implemented abort handler in pi-socket that calls ctx.abort() when receiving { type: 'abort' } messages, added 2 tests verifying abort behavior. All 96 pi-socket tests pass, protocol build succeeds.

tests: pi-socket: 96 tests pass (94 existing + 2 new abort tests)
